channel.title: SoftLayer_Network_Application_Delivery_Controller_LoadBalancer_VirtualIpAddress on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in SoftLayer_Network_Application_Delivery_Controller_LoadBalancer_VirtualIpAddress on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Application_Delivery_Controller_LoadBalancer_VirtualIpAddress
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Application_Delivery_Controller_LoadBalancer_VirtualIpAddress Service Datatype Description Local accountId The unique identifier of the SoftLayer customer account that owns the virtual IP address Type: integer connectionLimit The connection limit for this virtual IP address Type: integer connectionLimitUnits The units for the connection limit Type: string dedicatedFlag A flag that determines if a VIP is dedicated or not. This is used to override the connection limit and use an unlimited value.
